author: Press
title: Flavors of the Palace
text:
(MENAFN Press) On the 21st of October, Emirates Palace will be transformed into a gourmet wonderland. A culinary exposition representative of the culinary philosophy of Emirates Palace: a melting pot of fares; meet the masterminds who work behind-the-scenes to bring you the most divine treats.

An alfresco gourmet feast for your senses, journey through eight artisan displays where you can redeem vouchers to sample teasers and experience our chefs' unique twists on signature dishes from our award-winning restaurants. Watch live demonstrations and discover new techniques as you savour gourmet creations curated with the finest ingredients sourced for their quality and provenance.

Share in sublime experiences and the culinary culture of Emirates Palace, an icon of authentic Emirati hospitality, in a warm and ambient atmosphere perfect for mingling, sharing and discovery. A wonderful occasion for a gastronomic affair with your fellow gourmands, Emirates Palace's debut Flavours of the Palace is not to be missed. You could even win your own personalised master class in the comfort of your home.

Date: Wednesday, 21 October 2015
Location: West Wing Gazebo, Emirates Palace
Time: 7:00 p.m. â€œ 11:00 p.m.
Price: AED 150 per person (inclusive of food and beverage vouchers of equal worth)*

*Prices include 10% service charge and 6% tourism fee
*Extra vouchers may be purchased at the event.

For more information or to make your reservation, please contact Restaurant Reservations at 971 (0) 2690 7999 or email restaurants@emiratespalace.ae.
www.emiratepalace.ae
